name: Expression matrix subset
description: Performs a basic subset operation on a table/matrix, such as a raw RNA-seq count matrix. Use this for removing outlier or unwanted samples(columns) and genes/features(rows).

input_matrix.description: The input matrix. For example, a gene expression matrix.
input_matrix.name: Input matrix:

samples.description: A set of samples or columns in your file. Note that you can choose to either keep or remove these. If left blank, we will not remove any samples/columns
samples.name: Samples/columns:

features.description: A set of genes or rows in your file. Note that you can choose to either keep or remove these. If left blank, we will not remove any genes/rows.
features.name: Genes/rows:

keepsamples.description: By default, the set of samples/columns will be kept and the remaining columns will be removed. By unselecting, we will remove the samples/columns you have chosen.
keepsamples.name: Keep the selected samples/columns?:

keepfeatures.description: By default, the set of genes/rows will be kept and the remaining rows will be removed. By unselecting, we will remove the genes/rows you have chosen.
keepfeatures.name: Keep the selected genes/rows?:
